thread.title: Russian attacks in the Kherson region: 2 people killed, 6 more wounded | УНН
thread.title_full: Russian attacks in the Kherson region: 2 people killed, 6 more wounded | УНН

author: Julia Kotwicka
title: Russian attacks in the Kherson region: 2 people killed, 6 more wounded | УНН
text: Russian attacks in the Kherson region: 2 people killed, 6 more wounded Kyiv • UNN The occupiers shelled the settlements of Kherson region, damaging buildings and infrastructure. The attacks killed two people and injured six, including a 64-year-old man from Kizomys. The invaders' forces continue to attack the Kherson region, as a result of which 2 people were killed and 6 others were injured. This was reported by the head of the Kherson RMA, Oleksandr Prokudin, UNN reports. Details Over the past 24 hours, the aggression of the terrorist state has affected the settlements of Kherson region, including Antonivka, Beryslav, Novoberislav, Tomaryne, Chervonyi Mayak, Novovorontsovka, Mylove, Veletynske, Kizomys, Komyshany, Sadove and the city of Kherson. The occupiers attacked an educational institution and a shop, damaging them. In addition, residential areas were destroyed, including 5 multi-storey buildings and 9 private houses. The enemy also damaged a gas pipeline and agricultural machinery. This aggression killed two people and injured five others. Add According to the information, around five in the morning, the invading army shelled a house in Kizomys, injuring a 64-year-old man. He sustained contusion, blast injury and a broken tibia. The victim was taken to a hospital where he is receiving the necessary medical care.
